snippet: Michael Finley is contemplating a comeback to the N.B.A. while working with the Legends of the developmental league.
abstract: Michael Finley is contemplating a comeback to the N.B.A. while working with the Legends of the developmental league.
lead_paragraph: Former Mavericks forward Michael Finley hasn't played pro basketball for a year, stepping away due to ankle injuries. But that could possibly change soon, according to ESPN.com.

headline.main: Finley Helps Yi, Prepping Own Comeback?
